name: apinox-sidecar
description: APInox Node.js sidecar for Tauri desktop application

scripts.binary: npm run icons && npm run bundle && node build-binary.js
scripts.binary:all: npm run icons && npm run bundle && pkg bundle.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output apinox-sidecar --compress GZip
